title: Tech Stocks Could Sink 8% More, UBS Says. Here’s Why—and Where to Buy the Dip. - Barron's
content: Tech Stocks Could Sink 8% More, UBS Says. Here’s Why—and Where to Buy the Dip.  Barron's
description: If bond yields keep rising, tech could keep falling. The Swiss bank advises investors to be strategic about what to buy to take advantage.
